greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of the nonzero digits of (n written in base 6).
mathematica: nmax = 80; A[_] = 1; Do[A[x_] = (1 + x + 2 x^2 + 3 x^3 + 4 x^4 + 5 x^5) A[x^6] + O[x]^(nmax + 1) // Normal, nmax + 1]; CoefficientList[A[x], x]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 12 2020
